findings.title: Improper Logic Of VirtualTrade::sell()
findings.description: In the `VirtualTrade` protocol, there is an improper implementation of the `sell()` routine that needs to be improved.

findings.title: Duplicate Asset Detection and Prevention
findings.description: The `add_asset()` function in the `VirtualTrade` contract does not perform necessary sanity checks to prevent a new kind of virtual asset with a duplicate asset from being added.

findings.title: Trust Issue Of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the `Plutos VirtualTrade` protocol, there is a privileged account that plays a critical role in governing and regulating the protocol-wide operations.
